page.title: 19MRS BLAIR'S SHOP
page.content: Mrs Blair's shop is one of the smallest shops on the green.She said that if the council and the shopkeepers got together it would be better because then we would have clubs,marching bands and all sorts that would attract people to the village.Mrs Blair likes it in Chapel but thinks its a bit boring because there is little to do.Mrs Blair said that she would also like some large shops in the village like Fine Fare.She likes her shop,its new and its outside the bus stops.She thinks things should be changed around in shops,put in different places.She finds it very noisy at night especially in summer because all the kids shout and mess around outside her flat.The Blair family like the Chapel area but miss Nottingham's big shops. She sells gifts and hires out videos.
